titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: MLH1 IMMUNOHISTOCHEMISTRY NUCLEAR EXPRESSION INTACT INDICATION CODE - Description

div.p: MLH1 IMMUNOHISTOCHEMISTRY NUCLEAR EXPRESSION INTACT INDICATION CODE is the same as attribute IMMUNOHISTOCHEMISTRY NUCLEAR EXPRESSION INTACT INDICATION CODE.
MLH1 IMMUNOHISTOCHEMISTRY NUCLEAR EXPRESSION INTACT INDICATION CODE is an indication of whether the MLH1 (mutL homolog 1) immunohistochemistry nuclear expression is intact during a Cancer Care Spell.
